name: EROS: Electronic Relationship Optimization System
description:
Created for the College Game Jam 2021.

Welcome! You are EROS, the Electronic Relationship Optimization System. Your developers have set you up with a set of passionate and very eligible singles looking for love, lust, and everything in between. Test the limits of your software while finding out just what makes humans tick!

Title font is "Glitch Inside" by MaknaStudio on DaFont.com

We recommend playing in a 16:9 aspect ratio :)
